data.text:
It’s been 10 years since we visited this hotel and we weren’t disappointed. The hotel has had some excellent improvements made including the Waterpark and restaurants including the Bussola beach bar which was a new addition since our last visit.
The grounds are still beautifully maintained and the staff are still extremely friendly and professional.
A special shout out to Damaciano Fernandes who was exceptionally friendly helping with sun beds everyday - what a fantastic guy he is. 
Also Amiya who looked after our rooms everyday - he did a great job and always had a smile on his face. Thank you Amiya.
We will definitely be back.
data.title: Fantastic family hotel

data.text:
We really enjoyed our stay in the westin again!
We come every year and we enjoy the amazing service we get here!

Special thanks to the amazing crew:
Damaciano Fernandes for the great service, perfect sunbeds every day, always nice and kind!
Gabriel and his great team for the nice service at the pool!
Mister Chill from the buffet restaurant, you and your team do a really good job.

Also everybody from the concierge team, the bussola restaurant, cleaning staff for the clean rooms!

We will come again soon!
data.title: Great stay again at Westin hotel!

data.text:
This was only our second visit to Dubai, and our first to this resort following lots of recommendations.

Whilst initially we were underwhelmed with the service at the resort in the first few days, we will still award this resort a 5 star review, as the early disappointment was quickly more than compensated for with some of the best service we have experienced thereafter.

Special thanks to all of the staff, especially those pool and beach side, and I must pay particular reference to the wonderful Damaciano Fernandez who was just so attentive and was brilliant tending to every need and request of our family. He was brilliant with the children in particular.

Another mention to the one and only Prem. He looked after us most days by the pool with regular and prompt top ups on food and drinks. Always with a smiling happy demeanor.

The food at all of the restaurants has been absolutely top drawer, and the bubblicious brunch was a truly unforgettably indulgent experience - we’ve never seen anything like it!

The interconnecting rooms we had were spotless and huge, and accommodated my wife and I and four children perfectly.

The kids loved all the pools and of course the Waterpark. And we continue to be mesmerised by the scenery in and around the resort. Drinks at the back of the Italian overlooking the Marina is really very special, alongside the fish restaurant too.

We’ll certainly be back!
data.title: A special trip to the Westin

data.text:
Stayed in Westin in March 2024. There are no e-mail on web site to send my feedback, so have to place it here. Although at reception I`ve been told that I would receive feedback form in 3 days after departure.
Good points:
Great lobby
rooms are good, but not very new renovated, especially bathroom
very comfortable bed
food at Main restaurant is delicious for breakfast and for dinner ( you can find everything there, even fresh juices for breakfast)
beach is clean, sun beds are comfortable, you will receive free bottle of water on the beach ( but if you want second bottle is chargeable)
great night bar on the beach with fantastic view

some areas for improvement:
the biggest disappointment is service at main restaurant. In the evening restaurant was always full (with external guests for Iftar), we always have been asked to come after 20:00. It`s ok, we can wait till 20:00, no problem, but then you come after 20:00 most of the food is already not available, barbeque on terrace is already cold, ice cream is finished. I thing in such high level hotel service/food in the restaurant should be the same during whole period of dinner. Especially  during Ramadan, then you have external guests and hotel is full with own guests. When you want to seat outside on the terrace, you always will be refused due to unavailability of seats. But I always can find a lot of free tables there myself. 
On check in I`ve been upgraded to sea view room, we were very happy, but it seems that sea view room is not a best option there, that`s why they easily upgraded all our rooms. First of all smell and smoke of barbeque from main restaurant is almost in you room. Construction works opposite Marina is going 24 hrs, so you can hear it whole night. Also Wesitn garden employees with vacuum cleaner were working every night at 02:00 a.m and 05:00 a.m. This vacuum cleaner is very noisy and we couldn`t sleep whole night ( every night)
Beach is very good, but as sea is closed by Marina and due to ebb and flow beach became a bog or puddle after 14:00. 
But in general hotel is not bad, I am happy to return again, but some improvements should be done there.
data.title: Nice hotel, but improvement is required

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Naila, 

Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. I am really sorry to hear that your experience was below our standards.

Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations. 

I have shared your feedback with the concerned leadership team to ensure the necessary guidelines are in place and reviewed as it will help us to enhance our guests experience upon future stays.

We make sure to address all the points that have been mentioned with the team and take it further as an improvement opportunity.  

I hope that you give us another chance and choose to stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the area.

Sincerely,

Tatiana Zhukova

Duty Manager
Westin Dubai Mina Seyahi
tatiana.zhukova@westin.com
owner_response.author: Tatiana Zhukova

data.text:
We stayed for 5 nights over the Easter break. 
The hotel is beautiful. We had a nice room on the third floor with a great view over the marina. 
The food was amazing with the most bearable buffet we’ve ever experienced. 
Staff were very friendly and helpful. 
The grounds, pool and beach are pristine. 

The in-room toiletries were disappointing with pump bottles bolted to the wall and one teeny tiny bottle of Elemis moisturiser. 

We stayed on an all inclusive basis, which we felt the hotel didn’t really want to do. We weren’t allowed to order a whole bottle of wine at dinner, and there were restrictions on the number of side dishes at Baba’s steakhouse. Room service was also chargeable. 
We usually stay at ultra all inclusive hotels (IKOS etc) so this all came as a bit of a surprise and made us feel like 2nd class citizens to be honest. 
If the hotel doesn’t like all inclusive guests- stop offering it.
data.title: Mixed feelings
